sentences.english: All times, how many people in order to serve the motherland has been heavy resistance difficult?
sentences.chinese: 古今中外，有多少人为了报效祖国而受到了重重阻难？

sentences.english: We are prohihurtd from smoking on school grounds.
sentences.chinese: 我们被阻难在校园内抽烟。

sentences.english: We are prohichunkd from smoking on school grounds.
sentences.chinese: 我们被阻难在校园内抽烟。

sentences.english: They are fools to oppose us!
Even if it seems scary or unusual or hard, I’m going to do it, and I’m going to keep at it until I bear fruit.
sentences.chinese: 纵使阻难重重，我依然会去做，直到结出果实。

sentences.english: Even if it seems scary or unusual or hard, I'm going to do it.
sentences.chinese: 即使会阻难重重，我依然会去做。

definition: variant of 磨難|磨难[mo2 nan4]
to make sth difficult/to create obstacles
setback/reverse/check/defeat/frustration/disappointment/to frustrate/to discourage/to set sb back/to blunt/to subdue
bumpy (of a road)/rough (of life)/to be down on one's luck/to be full of frustrations and dashed hopes
lit. a path covered in brambles/a course of action beset by difficulties (idiom)
